mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_logs ( LOG_NO, USER_EMAIL, LOG_DATE, LOG_NEWTITLE ,LOG_NEWTEXT, LOG_NEWMEMBER, LOG_NEWSTART, LOG_NEWEND, LOG_NEWCOLOR) SELECT CONCAT('p', LOG_P_NO + 1, '-1'), #{useremail}, now(), #{pjtitle}, #{pjcnt}, #{pjmember}, #{pjstart}, #{pjend}, #{pjcolor} FROM project_logs ORDER BY LOG_P_NO DESC LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO project_logs (LOG_NO, LOG_P_NO, USER_EMAIL, LOG_OLDTITLE, LOG_NEWTITLE, LOG_OLDTEXT, LOG_NEWTEXT, LOG_OLDMEMBER, LOG_NEWMEMBER, LOG_OLDSTART, LOG_NEWSTART, LOG_OLDEND, LOG_NEWEND, LOG_DATE, LOG_OLDCOLOR, LOG_NEWCOLOR) SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(LOG_NO, '-', 1), '-', SUBSTRING_INDEX(LOG_NO, '-', -1) + 1) AS LOG_NO, LOG_P_NO, USER_EMAIL, LOG_NEWTITLE, NULL AS LOG_NEWTITLE, LOG_NEWTEXT, NULL AS LOG_NEWTEXT, LOG_NEWMEMBER, NULL AS LOG_NEWMEMBER, LOG_NEWSTART, NULL AS LOG_NEWSTART, LOG_NEWEND, NULL AS LOG_NEWEND, CURDATE() AS LOG_DATE, LOG_NEWCOLOR, NULL AS LOG_NEWCOLOR FROM project_logs WHERE LOG_P_NO = #{pjno} ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(LOG_NO, '-', -1) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_logs WHERE log_no = CONCAT('p' + #{pjno} + '-2')
